730846f.title: Bridges - Kill Van Kull Bridge - [Lanes for traffic.]
730846f.folder: Kill Van Kull Bridge, Staten Island, N.Y.

730838f-a.title: Bridges - Kill Van Kull Bridge - [World's tallest bridge span nearing completion.]
730838f-a.text:
WORLD'S TALLEST BRIDGE SPAN NEARING COMPLETION NEW VORK CITY -- An excellent and exclusive set of photos on the great Kill van Kull Bridge which will reach 8,075 feet from Staten Island to Bayonne, N.J. The structure, which is rapidly nearing completion, will have four lanes for vehicular traffic and two lanes for rapid transit. The arch will be 1,675 feet long-- the world's biggest. The span, when completed, will cost about $18,000,000.

Men at work on the bolts of the new span. In the background may be seen Bayonne, N.J.

Photo by Underwood and Underwood  N.D.
730838f-a.folder: Kill Van Kull Bridge, Staten Island, N.Y.

730839f-a.title: Bridges - Kill Van Kull Bridge - [World's greatest bridge span nearing completion.]
730839f-a.text:
Photo by UNDERWOOD and UNDERWOOD

WORLD'S GREATEST BRIDGE SPAN NEARING COMPLETION

NEW YORK CITY - An excellent and exclusive set of photos on the great Kill van Kull Bridge which will reach 8,075 feet from Staten SIland to Bayonne, New Jersey. The structure, which is rapidly nearing completion, will have four lanes for vehicular traffic and two lanes for rapid transit. The arch will be 1,675 foot long - the world's biggest. The span, when complete, will have cost about $18,000,000.

An interesting shot showing  a workman on one of the steel girders as a tug boat passes below.

16970B8 BRIDGE 1 (EXCLUSIVE)
730839f-a.folder: Kill Van Kull Bridge, Staten Island, N.Y.

730840f-a.title: Bridges - Kill Van Kull Bridge - [Under construction].
730840f-a.text:
WORLD'S GREATEST BRIDGE SPAN NEARING COMPLETION
NEW YORK CITY -- An excellent and exclusive set of photos on the great Kill van Kull Bridge which will reach 8,075 feet from Staten Island to Bayonne, New Jersey. The structure, which is rapidly nearing completion, will have four lanes for vehicular traffic and two lanes for rapid transit. The arch will be 1,675 feet long--the world's biggest. The span, when complete, will have cost about $18,000,000.
Two workmen tightening the cables on the span. Staten Island may be seen in the background.
E.  1696132  BRIDGE 2 (EXCLUSIVE)
730840f-a.folder: Kill Van Kull Bridge, Staten Island, N.Y.

730841f-a.title: Bridges - Kill Van Kull Bridge - [World's tallest bridge span nearing completion - Staten Island - Bayonne, New Jersey - 8,075 feet long.]
730841f-a.text:
WORLD'S GREATEST BRIDGE SPAN NEARING COMPLETION
NEW YORK CITY -- An excellent and exclusive set of photos on the great Kill van Kull Bridge which will reach 8,075 feet from Staten Island to Bayonne, New Jersey. The structure, which is rapidly nearing completion, will have four lanes for vehicular traffic and two lanes for rapid transit. The arch will be 1,675 feet long--the world's biggest. The span, when complete, will have cost about $18,000,000.
A study in steel--what the motorist sees whenhe starts across the new bridge.
16968D2  BRIDGE 4 (EXCLUSIVE)
730841f-a.folder: Kill Van Kull Bridge, Staten Island, N.Y.
